***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From हिँ (hĩ) +‎ किं (kiṃ).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [hĩkĩː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
हिँकिं • (hĩkiṃ) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐴𑐶𑑃𑐎𑐶𑑄)
   1. screw
            Synonym: पेच (peca)
